document_data.mainbody:
| organizations =
Citadel Firequench was the headquarters of the Firequench Order, a cabal of spellcasters that operated out of Tarmalune, one of the Windrise Ports of Laerakond.
Citadel Firequench was a massive basalt citadel west of the Raging Flames location, surrounded by the ruins of buildings destroyed by the fires of the Raging Flame.
Citadel Firequench was originally the property of a pirate baron and the previous citys jail before the Firequench Order was founded.
